sentences.sContent: The mission will also observe clouds and aerosol particles in the troposphere.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mission will also observe clouds and aerosol particles in the troposphere.
sentences.sCn: 此次任务还将观测对流层中的云和气溶胶粒子。

sentences.sContent: The chlorofluoromethanes are used principally in aerosol spray cans and as refrigerants .
sentences.sContent_eng: The chlorofluoromethanes are used principally in aerosol spray cans and as refrigerants .
sentences.sCn: 氯氟甲烷主要使用在气溶胶喷雾罐和作为冷冻剂。

sentences.sContent: They also found that new aerosol particles — ultrafine particles suspended in the atmosphere — can form at these heights.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also found that new aerosol particles — ultrafine particles suspended in the atmosphere — can form at these heights.
sentences.sCn: 他们还发现新的气溶胶颗粒——悬浮在大气中的超细颗粒——可以在这个高度形成。

synos.tran: [物化]气溶胶；[化工][中医][药]气雾剂；喷雾器；浮质

phrases.pCn: 气溶胶喷射剂；气溶胶火箭燃料
